author: dkhaywood
msg: added junit4.4 as an explicit dependency to allow Maven's surefire plugin to run the JUnit 4.4 tests.  Also updated surefire to 2.4.3.  Also added jersey and javax.servlet into dependencyManagement, as well as centralizing log4j version there also.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Made fix to map NOF DateTime value type to Hibernate TIMESTAMP rather than DATE (as per https://sourceforge.net/forum/message.php?msg_id=5016340 ).

author: dkhaywood
msg: Upgrading to ASM 3.1, fixing up CGLib and Hibernate references to support.  The upgrade is required because Jersey (JSR 311 Reference Implementation) uses ASM 3.1.
